CONSOLE WARNING: line 67: Calling Element.createShadowRoot() for an element which already hosts a shadow root is deprecated. See https://www.chromestatus.com/features/4668884095336448 for more details.
This is a testharness.js-based test.
PASS The title of elements in shadow inherits from the document 
PASS The title of distributed elements inherits in the flat tree 
PASS The title of distributed elements inherits in the flat tree (multiple shadow roots) 
PASS The title of distributed elements inherits in the flat tree (multiple levels) 
PASS The title of elements in older shadow roots inherits in the flat tree 
PASS The title of re-distributed elements inherits in the flat tree (multiple shadow roots) 
Harness: the test ran to completion.
